author: ETA PRIME
description:
AYANEO is shaking up the handheld gaming market again! They've just announced KONKR, a brand new budget-friendly sub-brand that could be a serious game-changer for affordable PC handhelds. Could this be the Steam Deck competitor we've been waiting for?
But that's not all. AYANEO also gave us a first look at the powerhouse AYANEO NEXT 2, set to feature the Ryzen AI MAX+ 395 mentioned). This device is poised to deliver some absolutely monstrous performance for AAA gaming and emulation.

In this video, we break down all the details on these new devices:
* KONKR: AYANEO's new budget brand.
* The KONKR Fit: A traditional handheld form factor.
* The POCKET DS Flip: A new clamshell design.
* AYANEO NEXT 2: The new performance king with cutting-edge AMD Ryzen AI tech.
What are your first impressions? Are you more excited for the affordable KONKR lineup or the raw power of the NEXT 2? Let me know what you think in the comments below!
#AYANEO #KONKR #AYANEONEXT2 #HandheldGaming #AMD #Ryzen


Fo
title: AYANEO's New Budget Line Could Be A Game Changer!

author: ETA PRIME
description:

Powered by the Dimensity 8300 Processor, 120Hz 4.7" 4.3aspect ratio screen and an all metal CNC Aluminum alloy shell this new retro handheld is shaping up to be a great retro console for sure.
